text: This patch implements an option to wrap FS11 and FS45 AFP images in a page segment, and an option to force images to FS45.  Detailed documentation included in patch.
creator: peter.hancock@gmail.com
bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
Hi Peter,

Thanks for your submission. Can you clarify the relationship between this patch and the similar patch you submitted on Bugzilla 49893: https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=49893

Does this Patch supercede the old one? 49893 introduces fs11-pseg attribute but your new patch supports pseg attribute instead.

Thanks,

Chris

creator: peter.hancock@gmail.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49893 ***

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
